subject: Re: Urgent Lavazza - change Banner on Home page
preview: Hi Natalia, We didn't have any tracking set up for that banner as it was not requested. It's also tricky to track out bound clicks on WordPress (inbound are straight forward). I'm assuming UpViral w

full_threads.body:
Hi Natalia, 

We didn't have any tracking set up for that banner as it was not requested. It's also tricky to track out bound clicks on WordPress (inbound are straight forward). 

I'm assuming UpViral would have a suite of analytics/tools that would be able to produce that data for you?

Hi Heath,

Hope you had a great weekend!

Could you please provide the results and insights from the competition banner that was updated on the Lavazza home page between the 11th until 21st of March?

Thanks,

Natalia LagodzkaAccount Executive (mon-fri)
